Tip of the Day
Skill levels exceeding an activity's main skill requirement gives +1.25% extra Work efficiency for what you're doing, up to 20 levels.

Venture into the hideout
Main Skill: Woodcutting
Max Efficiency: 200%

You venture into the gloomy mists outside of Blackspell Port, thick roots and even trees through the marshes blocking your way into the hideout.

The Venture into the hideout activity is a Woodcutting activity.
This is a movement activity, you will be teleported to Halfmaw Hideout upon completion of an action.

Location

This activity can be done at the following location:

  • Blackspell Port in Grand Duchy of Trellin-Erdwise

Requirements

Skill Level Requirements:

  • At least Woodcutting lvl. 50.

Keyword Requirements:

  • Requires [2] unique Light source equipped.

Visibility

This activity is always visible.

Ability

   Venture Into The Hideout
Effect Requirements Cooldowns
You venture into the hideout to Halfmaw Hideout. Activity requirements must be met. No cooldown.
